summary: In 1900, in Egypt, archaeologist Mark Brandon is asked by Ann Mercedes to find the tomb of Ra-Hotep but their quest is marred by intrigue, betrayal, murder and danger.
cast: Robert Taylor|Eleanor Parker|Carlos Thompson|Kurt Kasznar|Victor Jory|Leon Askin|Aldo Silvani|Samia Gamal|Rushdi Abazah|Leora Dana|Frank DeKova|Loutfi El Hakim|Mahmoud El-Sabbaa|Tewfik Helmy|David Leonard|Manuel Lopez|Laurette Luez|Sayed Mabrouk|Paul Maxey|Joseph Mell|Mahmud Shaikhaly
title: El valle de los reyes
